blogs.body: Nowadays, a blog is a regularly updated website or web page, and can either be used for personal use or to fulfill a business need.
blogs.author: chiao

blogs.title: welcom home
blogs.body: A lifestyle blog is a digital compilation of an author's personal interests, daily activities, or opinions on a subject. A lifestyle blog typically covers multiple hobbies or talents of the writer, rather than focusing on one subject alone
blogs.author: EE
